well_activity_remarks_html:
WELL_NAME API12 WAR_START_DT TEXT_REMARK
0 001 608084005200 2015-10-18 10/18/2015: Marked and surveyed well location. Continued heavy lift inspection of drill floor equipment. Replaced lower annular of BOP with 15k spool. 10/19/2015: Completed heavy lift inspection of drill floor equipment. Rig up and run 36" casing. 10/20/2015: Made up low pressure wellhead (LPWH) to 36" casing. Rigged down casing handling equipment. Ran in hole with 30" x 32" jetting BHA from surface to 319'. Made up CADA tool to LPWH and lowered through rotary. Tripped in hole (TIH) with casing and 30" x 32" BHA to 4;690'. Operations suspended due to incident on rig floor. Initiated safety stand down from operations. 10/21/2015: Continued safety stand down and incident investigation. 10/22/2015: Continued safety stand down and incident investigation. 10/23/2015: Continued safety stand down and incident investigation. 10/24/2015: Continued safety stand down and incident investigation.
1 001 608084005200 2015-10-25 10/25/2015: Continued safety stand down and incident investigation. 10/26/2015: Continued safety stand down and incident investigation. 10/27/2015: Continued safety stand down and incident investigation. 10/28/2015: Continued safety stand down and incident investigation. 10/29/2015: Continued safety stand down and incident investigation. 10/30/2015: Continued safety stand down and incident investigation. 10/31/2015: Continued safety stand down and incident investigation.
2 001 608084005200 2015-11-01 11/01/2015: Continued safety stand down and incident investigation. 11/02/2015: Continued safety stand down and incident investigation. 11/03/2015: Continued safety stand down and incident investigation. 11/04/2015: Continued safety stand down and incident investigation. 11/05/2015: Completed the safety stand down and incident investigation. Tripped to bottom from 4;407' to 4;919'. Jetted 36" casing 308' below the mud line to 5;228'. Between well maintenance on BOPs. Note: On 11/05/2015; Jay Gagneaux (Chevron) received an email from Kassim Kassim (BSEE) with approval to move forward per approved APD/RPD. 11/06/2015: Soaked 36" casing. Released the Dril-Quip Cam-Actuated Dril-Ahead tool. Drilled 30" x 32" hole from 5;228' to 5;965'. Calipered the hole with a lignite pill. Circulated the hole clean. Tripped out of the hole to 5;195'. Activated the Ported Ball Locking (PBL) sub and washed the low pressure wellhead housing. Tripped out of the hole to 2;122'. Continued between well maintenance on BOPs. Note: On 11/06/2015; Cesar Fuenmayor (Chevron) provided Kassim Kassim (BSEE) with 72-hr BOP stump test notification. 11/07/2015: Tripped out of the hole from 2;122' to surface with 30" x 32" BHA. Rigged up casing handling equipment. Picked up and ran 28" casing and inner string. Tripped in the hole and landed 28" casing hanger in the low pressure wellhead housing with casing shoe at 5;924'. Circulated 200 bbls of 11.5 ppg mud. Rigged up cement lines. Continued between well maintenance on BOPs.
3 001 608084005200 2015-11-08 11/08/2015: Pumped 413 bbls (541 bbls or 3;308 cu ft foamed down hole) of 16.4 ppg (12.5 ppg down hole) lead foamed slurry. Pumped 120 bbls (674 cu ft) of 16.4 bbl tail slurry with pH reaching 12.4 after 88 bbls pumped. Displaced cement slurry with 160 bbls of seawater. Lift pressure was 160 psi. Released 28" hanger running tool. Tipped out of hole with landing and inner strings from 5;801' to surface. Tripped in hole with 26" BHA from surface to 2;155'. 11/09/2015: Tripped in hole with 26" BHA from 2;155' to 5;622'. Washed down from 5;622' to top of cement at 5;833'. Drilled cement from 5;833' to 5;923'. Drilled 28" shoe at 5;923'. Cleaned cement from rathole from 5;923' to 5;965'. Drilled 26" hole from 5;965' to 7;400'. Weighted up to 10.5 ppg. Drilled 26" hole from 7;400' to 7;808'. 11/10/2015: Drilled 26" hole from 7;808' to 9;288'. Weighted up to 11.5 ppg. Drilled 26" hole from 9;288' to 9;575'. Tripped out of hole with 26" BHA from 9;575' to 9;509'. Pumped 300 bbls of 12.4 ppg lignite caliper pill. Tripped out of hole with 26" BHA from 9;509' to 4;595'. 11/11/2015: Tripped out of hole with 26" BHA from 4;595' to surface. Tripped in hole with 22" casing shoe and float collar joints from surface to 95'. Tripped in hole with 22" casing from 95' to 1;369'. 11/12/2015: Tripped in hole with 22" casing from 1;369' to 4;585'. Tripped in hole with 18-3/4" high pressure wellhead with casing joint from 4;585' to 4;643'. Tripped in hole from surface to 4;460' with 5-7/8" drill pipe diverter. Tripped in hole with 22" casing from 4;643' to 4;961'. Displaced the landing and inner strings; and shoe track to 13.3 ppg. 11/13/2015: Tripped in hole with 22" casing from 4;961' to 9;547'. Pumped 200 bbls of 13.3 ppg spacer. Pumped 986 bbls of 16.4 ppg lead cement (1;164 bbls or 6;536 cu ft down hole foamed; pH reading was 13.7 at end of pumping sequence). Returns verified at mudline. Displaced cement with 251 bbls of seawater. Tripped out of hole with MRLD; inner and landing strings from 9;272' to 9;008'. Displaced well with 1;780 bbls of 11.0 ppg mud. Tripped out of hole with MRLD; inner and landing strings from 9;008' to surface. 11/14/2015: Soak tested both PODs in non-drilling mode. Stacked lower marine riser package on blowout preventers. Functioned BSR/CSR from Blue and Yellow Pods. Functioned emergency hydraulic backup system from key.
4 001 608084005200 2015-11-15 11/15/2015: Completed pre checks and began BOP Stump test. Completed ROV intervention tests. Completed EDS 1 dry fire; EDS 2 dry fire; and EDS 3 wet fire tests. 11/16/2015: Continue pre-deployment BOP stump test. Completed the pre deployment EHBS and accumulator drawdown. Started function testing the BOP. 11/17/2015: Complete pre-deployment BOP stump test. Stage riser equipment to rig floor. 11/18/2015: Continue pre-deployment pressure testing. Began precharging accumulator bottles to subsea pressure values. 11/19/2015: Completed pre-charging accumulator bottles. Change out diverter element and pressure tested diverter packer. Continue with BOP pre-run check list. 11/20/2015: Continue with pre-deployment checks on BOP and prepare for deployment. Pressured up BOP. Hooked up lines on rig floor to test riser joints while tripping. 11/21/2015: Test mud boost line and riser conduit lines. Test choke & kill line. Run BOP/LMRP on marine riser from 179' to 2;159' while testing Boost (250/5;000 psi) and Riser Conduits (5;000 psi). Test choke & kill lines to (250/11;600 psi). Run BOP on marine riser from 2;159' to 3;149'.
5 001 608084005200 2015-11-22 1/22/2015: Run BOP on marine riser from 3;149' to 4;769'. Pressure test boost; choke; kill and rigid conduit lines (good test). Make up slip joint and landing joint. Install drape hoses and storm loops. 11/23/2015: Pressure test choke and kill lines (good test). Move vessel to wellhead. Land and latch BOP onto wellhead. Unlock and scope out slip joint. Lay out landing joint. Perform ROV intervention test by closing blind shear rams and testing 22" casing to 4;500 psi for 30 mins (good test). Install diverter. Rig down riser running equipment. Slip & cut drill line while testing choke and kill manifold offline. Perform diverter flow test. Trip in hole with Dual Cam/ Subsea BOP Test Tool (SBOPTT) assembly from surface to 2;746'. 11/24/2015: Continue to trip in hole with Dual Cam/ SBOPTT assembly to 6;145'. Perform accumulator draw down test (good test). Pressure test BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe with 8.6 ppg seawater (good test). Function test BOPs from Toolpusher's panel on Blue Pod and from Driller's panel on Yellow Pod (good test). Functioned diverter on Driller's and Toolpusher's panels (good test). Released Dual Cam and pressure tested BSRs and connector to 12;300 psi high/ 250 psi low (good test). Perform BOP emergency hydraulic back-up system test to 1;000 psi (good test). Engage dual cam and unseat SBOPTT. Pull out of hole with Dual Cam/ SBOPTT from 6;316' to surface. Function test shear rams from Toolpusher's panel on Blue Pod and from Driller's panel on Yellow Pod (good test). Pressure test top drive manual IBOP and begin pressure test on top drive lower auto IBOP. 11/25/2015: Pressure test top drive upper and lower IBOPs to 250 psi low/ 11;600 psi high (good test). Successfully test kelly hose to 250 psi low/ 7;400 psi high. Rig down test lines and run in hole with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from surface to 9;250'. Wash down from 9;250' with 100 gpm at 72 psi. Tag cement at 9;334'. 11/26/2015: Displace boost; choke and kill lines with 11.1 ppg SBM. Displace drill string with 11.1 ppg SBM. Ream through stringer at 9;334' and wash down to hard cement at 9;443'. Drill cement from 9;443' to 9;454' while displacing wellbore. Finish displacement at 9;454' and line up pit system for SBM returns. Hold choke drill. Drill cement to 9;575'. Drill 10' of new formation to 9;585'; circulate bottoms up. Perform LOT to 12.7 ppg equivalent mud weight (805 psi). Drill 18-1/8" hole from 9;585' to 9;750'. Activate reamer. Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 9;750' to 10;146'. 11/27/2015: Continue to drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 10;146' to 12;322'. 11/28/2015: Continue to drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 12;322' to 12;439'. Observe 2 bbl gain in active system. Flow check. Gain 13.7 bbls in trip tank over 35 minutes. Shut in and establish stabilized SICP 470 psi. Bump float and establish SIDPP 500 psi. Weight up active system to 12.3 ppg KWM. Bring well on choke using Wait & Weight Method holding 510 psi (470 + 40 psi SF) constant on kill line until pumps up to speed. Follow drill pipe pressure schedule until KWM at bit. Increased SIDPP incrementally to 350 psi to stabilize a 2-3 bbl/hr pit gain over barite addition. Continue circulating out kick at 20 SPM; maintaining FCP. Work pipe every 2 hrs to ensure still free.
6 001 608084005200 2015-11-29 11/29/2015: Circulated 12.3 ppg kill weight mud (KWM) with well on choke until losing returns. Monitored shut-in casing pressure (SICP) 120 psi; kill line pressure (Kill) 200 psi; and wellhead pressure (WH) 3;280 psi. Attempted to circulate with no communication to backside. Isolate wellbore. Sweep stack. Built and spot 16.5 ppg riser cap. 11/30/2015: Tripped out of hole from 12;322' to 9;122' with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA. 12/01/2015: Tripped out of hole from 9;122' to 2;979' with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA. Function tested BOPs; BSRs; and diverter from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod and from Driller's panel on Blue Pod. Note: On 12/01/2015; received verbal approval via email from Kassim Kassim (BSEE) to change 18" casing set depth; as follows: "Due to down hole conditions and experiencing mud losses during drilling through the salt section; your request to set the 18" X 17 7/8" liner shallow by 1235' at 12;265' MD and continue with the drilling operation is approved. This approval is contingent on the District Operations Support (DOS) approves the revised WCST. The RPD will be reviewed and approved accordingly." 12/02/2015: Tripped out of hole from 2;979' to surface with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA. Tripped in hole from surface to 517' with 17-7/8" x 18" casing. 12/03/2015: Tripped in hole from 517' to 3;122' with 17-7/8" x 18" casing. Ran 5-7/8" inner string to 2;925'. Tripped in the hole with casing on 6-5/8" landing string to 5;000'. 12/04/2015: Tripped in hole from 5;000' to 10;980' with 17-7/8" x 18" casing. Attempted to run casing to bottom with unsuccessful results. Decided to POOH with casing string. Tripped out of hole with casing from 10;980' to 4;487'. 12/05/2015: Tripped out of hole with 17-7/8" x 18" casing on landing string from 4;487' to 3;122'. Tripped out of hole with 5-7/8" inner string from 2;969' to surface. Tripped out of hole with 17-7/8" x 18" casing from 3;122' to surface.
7 001 608084005200 2015-12-06 ********************CORRECTION REPORT SUBMITTED 1-8-2016***************************************** TD WAS REPORTED AS 12444' MD/TVD IN THE FINAL WAR FOR THIS WELLBORE. PLEASE CORRECT THE TD 12439' MD/TVD. (SHOCKLEM 1-11-2016) 12/06/2015: Successfully function tested BSRs/CSRs. Tripped in hole with 6.625" cement diverter from surface to 10;950'. Pumped a 500 ft (1;201 cu ft) 16.4 ppg balanced cement plug from 10;950' to 10;450'. Tripped out of hole with 6.625" cement diverter from 10;950' to 9;849'. 12/07/2015: Tripped in hole with 6.625" cement diverter from 9;849' to 10;450'. Washed down from 10;450' to 10;606'. Tagged cement at 10;606'. Pumped a 550 ft (1;325 cu ft) 16.4 ppg balanced cement plug from 10;600' to 10;050'. Tripped out of hole with 6.625" cement diverter from 10;600' to 9;473'. Tripped in hole with 6.625" cement diverter from 9;473' to 9;900'. Washed down from 9;900' to top of cement at 10;060'. Pumped a 710 ft (1;684 cu ft) 17.0 ppg balanced cement plug from 10;060' to 9;350'. Tripped out of hole with 6.625" cement diverter from 10;060' to 8;931'. 12/08/2015: Tripped in hole with 6.625" cement diverter from 8;931' to 9;294'. Washed down from 9;294' to 9;615'. Function tested BOPs from the Driller's panel on Yellow Pod and from the Toolpusher's panel on Blue Pod; good test. Function tested the diverter from the Driller's and Toolpusher's panel; good test. Pumped a 265 ft (595 cu ft) 17.0 ppg balanced cement plug from 9;615' to 9;350'. Tripped out of hole with 6.625" cement diverter from 9;615' to 5;413'. 12/09/2015: Tripped out of hole with 6.625" cement diverter from 5;413' to 2;460'. Tripped in hole with 6.625" cement diverter from 2;460' to 8;420'. Pressure tested BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe with 12.3 ppg. Functioned BOPs from Driller's panel on Yellow Pod. Tested annular to 250/6;100 psi; rams to 250/7;700 psi; surface equipment to 250/8;600 psi; and kelly hose to 250/7;000 psi. All tests successful. Tripped in hole with 6.625" cement diverter from 8;420' to 9;252'. 12/10/2015: Washed down with 6.625" cement diverter from 9;252' to 9;363'. Tripped out of hole with 6.625" cement diverter from 9;363' to 9;317'. Closed annular and successfully pressure tested cement plug inside the 22" casing to 1;000 psi. Tripped out of hole with 6.625" cement diverter from 9;363' to surface. 12/11/2015: Tripped in hole with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from surface to 9;366'. Displaced well from 12.3 ppg SBM to 11.6 ppg SBM. Drilled cement with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 9;366' to 9;436'. Circulated and continued to displace well from 12.3 ppg SBM to 11.6 ppg SBM. Took slow circulating rates and choke line frictions. Performed choke drill and drilled cement from 9;436' to 9;570'. 12/12/2015: Directionally drilled with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 9;570' to 9;817'; kick off point noted at 9;745' MD. Tripped out of hole with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 9;817' to 9;570'. Successfully performed FIT to 12.1 ppg equivalent mud weight using a test pressure of 263 psi with 11.6 ppg mud weight. Tripped in hole with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 9;570' to 9;817'. Drilled with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 9;817' to 10;551'. Weighted up to 11.8 ppg SBM.
8 001 608084005201 2015-12-06 12/06/2015: Successfully function tested BSRs/CSRs. Tripped in hole with 6.625" cement diverter from surface to 10;950'. Pumped a 500 ft (1;201 cu ft) 16.4 ppg balanced cement plug from 10;950' to 10;450'. Tripped out of hole with 6.625" cement diverter from 10;950' to 9;849'. 12/07/2015: Tripped in hole with 6.625" cement diverter from 9;849' to 10;450'. Washed down from 10;450' to 10;606'. Tagged cement at 10;606'. Pumped a 550 ft (1;325 cu ft) 16.4 ppg balanced cement plug from 10;600' to 10;050'. Tripped out of hole with 6.625" cement diverter from 10;600' to 9;473'. Tripped in hole with 6.625" cement diverter from 9;473' to 9;900'. Washed down from 9;900' to top of cement at 10;060'. Pumped a 710 ft (1;684 cu ft) 17.0 ppg balanced cement plug from 10;060' to 9;350'. Tripped out of hole with 6.625" cement diverter from 10;060' to 8;931'. 12/08/2015: Tripped in hole with 6.625" cement diverter from 8;931' to 9;294'. Washed down from 9;294' to 9;615'. Function tested BOPs from the Driller's panel on Yellow Pod and from the Toolpusher's panel on Blue Pod; good test. Function tested the diverter from the Driller's and Toolpusher's panel; good test. Pumped a 265 ft (595 cu ft) 17.0 ppg balanced cement plug from 9;615' to 9;350'. Tripped out of hole with 6.625" cement diverter from 9;615' to 5;413'. 12/09/2015: Tripped out of hole with 6.625" cement diverter from 5;413' to 2;460'. Tripped in hole with 6.625" cement diverter from 2;460' to 8;420'. Pressure tested BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe with 12.3 ppg. Functioned BOPs from Driller's panel on Yellow Pod. well_activity_remarks_dict.TEXT_REMARK:
10/18/2015: Marked and surveyed well location. Continued heavy lift inspection of drill floor equipment. Replaced lower annular of BOP with 15k spool.

10/19/2015: Completed heavy lift inspection of drill floor equipment. Rig up and run 36" casing.

10/20/2015: Made up low pressure wellhead (LPWH) to 36" casing. Rigged down casing handling equipment. Ran in hole with 30" x 32" jetting BHA from surface to 319'. Made up CADA tool to LPWH and lowered through rotary. Tripped in hole (TIH) with casing and 30" x 32" BHA to 4;690'. Operations suspended due to incident on rig floor. Initiated safety stand down from operations.

10/21/2015: Continued safety stand down and incident investigation.

10/22/2015: Continued safety stand down and incident investigation.

11/01/2015: Continued safety stand down and incident investigation.

11/02/2015: Continued safety stand down and incident investigation.

11/03/2015: Continued safety stand down and incident investigation.

11/04/2015: Continued safety stand down and incident investigation.

11/05/2015: Completed the safety stand down and incident investigation. Tripped to bottom from 4;407' to 4;919'. Jetted 36" casing 308' below the mud line to 5;228'. Between well maintenance on BOPs.

Note: On 11/05/2015; Jay Gagneaux (Chevron) received an email from Kassim Kassim (BSEE) with approval to move forward per approved APD/RPD.

11/06/2015: Soaked 36" casing. Released the Dril-Quip Cam-Actuated Dril-Ahead tool. Drilled 30" x 32" hole from 5;228' to 5;965'. Calipered the hole with a lignite pill. Circulated the hole clean. Tripped out of the hole to 5;195'. Activated the Ported Ball Locking (PBL) sub and washed the low pressure wellhead housing. Tripped out of the hole to 2;122'. Continued between well maintenance on BOPs.

Note: On 11/06/2015; Cesar Fuenmayor (Chevron) provided Kassim Kassim (BSEE) with 72-hr BOP stump test notification. 

11/07/2015: Tripped out of the hole from 2;122' to surface with 30" x 32" BHA. Rigged up casing handling equipment. Picked up and ran 28" casing and inner string. Tripped in the hole and landed 28" casing hanger in the low pressure wellhead housing with casing shoe at 5;924'. Circulated 200 bbls of 11.5 ppg mud. Rigged up cement lines. Continued between well maintenance on BOPs.

11/08/2015: Pumped 413 bbls (541 bbls or 3;308 cu ft foamed down hole) of 16.4 ppg (12.5 ppg down hole) lead foamed slurry. Pumped 120 bbls (674 cu ft) of 16.4 bbl tail slurry with pH reaching 12.4 after 88 bbls pumped. Displaced cement slurry with 160 bbls of seawater. Lift pressure was 160 psi. Released 28" hanger running tool. Tipped out of hole with landing and inner strings from 5;801' to surface. Tripped in hole with 26" BHA from surface to 2;155'.

11/09/2015: Tripped in hole with 26" BHA from 2;155' to 5;622'. Washed down from 5;622' to top of cement at 5;833'. Drilled cement from 5;833' to 5;923'. Drilled 28" shoe at 5;923'. Cleaned cement from rathole from 5;923' to 5;965'. Drilled 26" hole from 5;965' to 7;400'. Weighted up to 10.5 ppg. Drilled 26" hole from 7;400' to 7;808'. 

11/10/2015: Drilled 26" hole from 7;808' to 9;288'. Weighted up to 11.5 ppg. Drilled 26" hole from 9;288' to 9;575'. Tripped out of hole with 26" BHA from 9;575' to 9;509'. Pumped 300 bbls of 12.4 ppg lignite caliper pill. Tripped out of hole with 26" BHA from 9;509' to 4;595'. 

11/11/2015: Tripped out of hole with 26" BHA from 4;595' to surface. Tripped in hole with 22" casing shoe and float collar joints from surface to 95'. Tripped in hole with 22" casing from 95' to 1;369'. 

11/12/2015: Tripped in hole with 22" casing from 1;369' to 4;585'. Tripped in hole with 18-3/4" high pressure wellhead with casing joint from 4;585' to 4;643'. Tripped in hole from surface to 4;460' with 5-7/8" drill pipe diverter. Tripped in hole with 22" casing from 4;643' to 4;961'. Displaced the landing and inner strings; and shoe track to 13.3 ppg. 

11/13/2015: Tripped in hole with 22" casing from 4;961' to 9;547'. Pumped 200 bbls of 13.3 ppg spacer. Pumped 986 bbls of 16.4 ppg lead cement (1;164 bbls or 6;536 cu ft down hole foamed; pH reading was 13.7 at end of pumping sequence). Returns verified at mudline. Displaced cement with 251 bbls of seawater. Tripped out of hole with MRLD; inner and landing strings from 9;272' to 9;008'. Displaced well with 1;780 bbls of 11.0 ppg mud. Tripped out of hole with MRLD; inner and landing strings from 9;008' to surface. 

11/14/2015: Soak tested both PODs in non-drilling mode. Stacked lower marine riser package on blowout preventers. Functioned BSR/CSR from Blue and Yellow Pods. Functioned emergency hydraulic backup system from key.

11/15/2015: Completed pre checks and began BOP Stump test. Completed ROV intervention tests. Completed EDS 1 dry fire; EDS 2 dry fire; and EDS 3 wet fire tests.

11/16/2015: Continue pre-deployment BOP stump test. Completed the pre deployment EHBS and accumulator drawdown. Started function testing the BOP.

11/17/2015: Complete pre-deployment BOP stump test. Stage riser equipment to rig floor.

11/18/2015: Continue pre-deployment pressure testing. Began precharging accumulator bottles to subsea pressure values.

11/19/2015: Completed pre-charging accumulator bottles. Change out diverter element and pressure tested diverter packer. Continue with BOP pre-run check list.

11/20/2015: Continue with pre-deployment checks on BOP and prepare for deployment.  Pressured up BOP. Hooked up lines on rig floor to test riser joints while tripping.

11/21/2015: Test mud boost line and riser conduit lines. Test choke & kill line. Run BOP/LMRP on marine riser from 179' to 2;159' while testing Boost (250/5;000 psi) and Riser Conduits (5;000 psi). Test choke & kill lines to (250/11;600 psi). Run BOP on marine riser from 2;159' to 3;149'.

1/22/2015: Run BOP on marine riser from 3;149' to 4;769'. Pressure test boost; choke; kill and rigid conduit lines (good test). Make up slip joint and landing joint. Install drape hoses and storm loops.

11/23/2015: Pressure test choke and kill lines (good test). Move vessel to wellhead. Land and latch BOP onto wellhead. Unlock and scope out slip joint. Lay out landing joint. Perform ROV intervention test by closing blind shear rams and testing 22" casing to 4;500 psi for 30 mins (good test). Install diverter. Rig down riser running equipment. Slip & cut drill line while testing choke and kill manifold offline. Perform diverter flow test. Trip in hole with Dual Cam/ Subsea BOP Test Tool (SBOPTT) assembly from surface to 2;746'.

11/24/2015: Continue to trip in hole with Dual Cam/ SBOPTT assembly to 6;145'. Perform accumulator draw down test (good test). Pressure test BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe with 8.6 ppg seawater (good test). Function test BOPs from Toolpusher's panel on Blue Pod and from Driller's panel on Yellow Pod (good test). Functioned diverter on Driller's and Toolpusher's panels (good test). Released Dual Cam and pressure tested BSRs and connector to 12;300 psi high/ 250 psi low (good test). Perform BOP emergency hydraulic back-up system test to 1;000 psi (good test). Engage dual cam and unseat SBOPTT. Pull out of hole with Dual Cam/ SBOPTT from 6;316' to surface. Function test shear rams from Toolpusher's panel on Blue Pod and from Driller's panel on Yellow Pod (good test). Pressure test top drive manual IBOP and begin pressure test on top drive lower auto IBOP.

11/25/2015: Pressure test top drive upper and lower IBOPs to 250 psi low/ 11;600 psi high (good test). Successfully test kelly hose to 250 psi low/ 7;400 psi high. Rig down test lines and run in hole with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from surface to 9;250'. Wash down from 9;250' with 100 gpm at 72 psi. Tag cement at 9;334'. 

11/26/2015: Displace boost; choke and kill lines with 11.1 ppg SBM. Displace drill string with 11.1 ppg SBM. Ream through stringer at 9;334' and wash down to hard cement at 9;443'. Drill cement from 9;443' to 9;454' while displacing wellbore. Finish displacement at 9;454' and line up pit system for SBM returns. Hold choke drill. Drill cement to 9;575'. Drill 10' of new formation to 9;585'; circulate bottoms up. Perform LOT to 12.7 ppg equivalent mud weight (805 psi). Drill 18-1/8" hole from 9;585' to 9;750'. Activate reamer. Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 9;750' to 10;146'.

11/27/2015: Continue to drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 10;146' to 12;322'.

11/28/2015: Continue to drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 12;322' to 12;439'. Observe 2 bbl gain in active system. Flow check. Gain 13.7 bbls in trip tank over 35 minutes. Shut in and establish stabilized SICP 470 psi. Bump float and establish SIDPP 500 psi. Weight up active system to 12.3 ppg KWM. Bring well on choke using Wait & Weight Method holding 510 psi (470 + 40 psi SF) constant on kill line until pumps up to speed. Follow drill pipe pressure schedule until KWM at bit. Increased SIDPP incrementally to 350 psi to stabilize a 2-3 bbl/hr pit gain over barite addition. Continue circulating out kick at 20 SPM; maintaining FCP. Work pipe every 2 hrs to ensure still free.

11/29/2015: Circulated 12.3 ppg kill weight mud (KWM) with well on choke until losing returns. Monitored shut-in casing pressure (SICP) 120 psi; kill line pressure (Kill) 200 psi; and wellhead pressure (WH) 3;280 psi. Attempted to circulate with no communication to backside. Isolate wellbore. Sweep stack. Built and spot 16.5 ppg riser cap. 

11/30/2015: Tripped out of hole from 12;322' to 9;122' with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA. 

12/01/2015: Tripped out of hole from 9;122' to 2;979' with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA. Function tested BOPs; BSRs; and diverter from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod and from Driller's panel on Blue Pod.
 
Note: On 12/01/2015; received verbal approval via email from Kassim Kassim (BSEE) to change 18" casing set depth; as follows: "Due to down hole conditions and experiencing mud losses during drilling through the salt section; your request to set the 18" X 17 7/8" liner shallow by 1235' at 12;265' MD and continue with the drilling operation is approved. This approval is contingent on the District Operations Support (DOS) approves the revised WCST. The RPD will be reviewed and approved accordingly."

12/02/2015: Tripped out of hole from 2;979' to surface with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA. Tripped in hole from surface to 517' with 17-7/8" x 18" casing.

12/03/2015: Tripped in hole from 517' to 3;122' with 17-7/8" x 18" casing. Ran 5-7/8" inner string to 2;925'. Tripped in the hole with casing on 6-5/8" landing string to 5;000'. 

12/04/2015: Tripped in hole from 5;000' to 10;980' with 17-7/8" x 18" casing. Attempted to run casing to bottom with unsuccessful results. Decided to POOH with casing string. Tripped out of hole with casing from 10;980' to 4;487'. 

12/05/2015: Tripped out of hole with 17-7/8" x 18" casing on landing string from 4;487' to 3;122'. Tripped out of hole with 5-7/8" inner string from 2;969' to surface. Tripped out of hole with 17-7/8" x 18" casing from 3;122' to surface.

Pressure test choke manifold and surface equipment to 250 psi low/ 11;600 psi high from Toolpusher's Panel on the Yellow Pod. All tests performed with 15.8 ppg SBM utilizing IPT SureTec Software; all good tests. Continue TIH with 10-5/8" x 12- 1/4" assy to 25;187'. Wash and ream cement from 25;187' to 25;460'. 

04/18/2016: Wash and ream to top of firm cement at 26;145'. Drill cement from 26;145' to 26;978' (hard cement started at 26;265'). Wash and ream open hole to TD at 26;990'. Drill 10' of new formation from 26;990' to 27;000'. 

04/19/2016: Performed Formation Integrity Test (FIT) to 1;145 psi or 16.6 ppg EMW. Drilled 10-5/8" from 27;000' to 27;274'. 

04/20/2016: Drilled 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" hole from 27;274' to 27;595'. 

04/21/2016: Drilled 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" hole from 27;595' to 27;939'. Encountered losses at max 40 bph and sustained 20 bph at 27;000'. Loss rates are marginal and continued to treat losses with LCM sweeps while drilling.

04/22/2016: Drilled 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" hole from 27;939' to 28;218'. Treated losses with LCM sweeps while circulating. 

04/23/2016: Drilled 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" hole from 28;218' to 28;370'. Treated losses with LCM sweeps while circulating. Circulated bottoms up.

04/24/2016: Continued circulating bottoms up (CBU) with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA in 15.8 ppg SBM. Pumped out of hole from 28;895' to 23;398' MD. Trip out of hole (TOH) from 23;398' to 13;906' MD. Monitored well; well static.

04/25/2016: Continued TOH with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 13;906' to 5;204' MD in 15.8 ppg SBM. Washed BOP while reciprocating drill pipe (DP). TOH from 5;204' MD to surface. Ran in hole (RIH) with wireline BHA #1 from surface to 28;386' MD. Logged from 28;386' to 27;164' MD.

04/26/2016: Continued to log with wireline BHA #1 from 27;164' to 26;970' MD in 15.8 ppg SBM. Pulled out of hole (POOH) from 26;970' MD to surface. RIH with wireline BHA #2 from surface to 28;260' MD. Acquired pressure samples.

04/27/2016: Continued to acquire pressure and fluid samples with wireline BHA #2 from 28;035' to 27;369' MD in 15.8 ppg SBM.

04/28/2016: Continued to acquire pressure and fluid samples with wireline BHA #2 from 28;035' to 27;369' MD in 15.8 ppg SBM. POOH with wireline BHA #2 from 27;369' to 2;000' MD.

04/29/2016: Continued to POOH with wireline BHA #2 from 2;000' MD to surface in 15.8 ppg SBM. Function tested blind shear ram/ casing shear ram (BSR/CSR) from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod; tests successful. Tripped in hole (TIH) with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from surface to 16;229' MD. Began pressure test of BOP with 15.8 ppg SBM from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod. Tested annular to 250/5;200 psi; rams to 250/9;700 psi; and surface equipment to 250/11;600 psi.

04/30/2016: Continued to pressure test BOP on Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod; with 15.8 ppg SBM utilizing IPT software. Tested annular to 250/5;200 psi; rams to 250/9;700 psi; and surface equipment to 250/11;600 psi; all tests successful. Function tested BOP and diverter from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod; and function tested diverter from Driller's and Toolpusher's Panels; all tests successful. TIH with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 16;229' to 26;892' MD.

05/01/2016: Tripped in hole (TIH) with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 26;892' to 28;370' MD in 15.8 ppg SBM. Circulated bottoms up (CBU) to 3;000' below BOP. Closed annular and CBU through choke and kill lines. Opened annular and drilled hole from 28;370' to 28;616' MD.

05/02/2016: Continued drilling 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" hole from 28;616' to 29;130' MD in 15.8 ppg SBM; taking Stethoscope pressure samples as required.

05/03/2016: Continued drilling 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" hole from 29;130' to 29;294' MD in 15.8 ppg SBM. CBU while weighting up from 15.8 to 15.9 ppg SBM. Pumped out of hole from 29;294' to 23;424' MD. 

05/04/2016: Tripped out of hole (TOH) with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 23;424' to surface in 15.9 ppg SBM. Ran in hole (RIH) with wireline BHA #1 from surface to 20;000' MD.

Note: Daniel Gonzalez; Casey Conklin and Alvin S. Obrien from BSEE Lake Jackson District arrived on rig at 08:45 hrs to inspect rig; paperwork and recent incident with the parted sling. Departed rig at 15:50 hrs.

05/05/2016: Continued to RIH with wireline BHA #1 in 15.9 ppg SBM from 20;000' to 26;930' MD. Logged from 26;930' to 28;900'. TOH with wireline BHA #1 from 28;900' MD to surface. RIH with wireline BHA #2 from surface to 28;678' MD and collected pressure samples as required.

Note: Daniel Gonzalez; Casey Conklin and Alvin S. Obrien from BSEE Lake Jackson District arrived on rig at 08:34 hrs to inspect rig; paper work and recent incident with the parted sling. Departed rig at 14:22 hrs.;

05/06/2016: Continued obtaining pressure and fluid samples with wireline BHA #2 in 15.9 ppg SBM. TOH with wireline BHA #2 from 28;700' to 23;000' MD.

Note: Cesar Fuenmayor (Chevron) received approval for a 72 hour extension on the casing and BSR pressure tests for the period from May 9 through midnight on May 12; 2016; due to ongoing intensive formation evaluation logging operations. This approval was granted by Kassim Y. Kassim (BSEE) on May 6; 2016; at 3:46:52 PM CDT.

05/07/2016: Continued TOH with wireline BHA #2 from 23;000' MD to surface in 15.9 ppg SBM. RIH with wireline BHA #3 from surface to 29;195' MD. Obtained sidewall cores with wireline BHA #3 per requirements.

05/08/2016: Continued obtaining sidewall cores with wireline (WL) assembly #3. Pulled out of the hole with wireline assembly #3 to surface. Ran in hole for descent 2 of assembly #3. At 10;000'; WL failed. Pulled out of hole to surface and changed out failed components. Ran in hole to next core point and continue obtaining rotary sidewall core samples as per Chevron Geology and Geophysics (CVX G&G).

05/09/2016: Continued obtaining sidewall cores as per CVX G&G. Pull out of hole with WL assembly #3 to surface. Picked up and ran in hole (RIH) with WL Run #4. Continued performing open hole evaluations as per CVX G&G.

05/10/2016: Pulled out of the hole with WL Run #4. RIH with WL assembly #5; in lieu of casing pressure test. Logged up from 26;470' to 23;450'. RIH to 25;000' and encountered tool failure. Pulled out of the hole to troubleshoot tools. RIH to 25;000' with second WL assembly #5.

05/11/2016: Logged from 26;970' to 5;000'. Pulled out of hole with WL assembly #5. TIH to 16;427' with 10-5/8" drilling BHA and Dual Cam and Special Blowout Preventer Test Tool (SBOPTT) assembly. Attempted to seat SBOPTT without success. TOH with SBOPTT and Dual Cam assembly to 13;867'. 

05/12/2016: Continued TOH with SBOPTT to surface. Inspected and serviced SBOPTT. TIH with SBOPTT assembly #2. Attempted to seat and energize SBOPTT seals without success. TOH with SBOPTT assembly #2. TIH with RTTS and set at 5;402'. Released and picked up above BOP. Pressure tested BSR against RTTS packer with 15.9 ppg to 250/1;500 psi for 5 min using Suretec IPT software; functioning BSR from Toolpusher's Panel on Blue Pod. Tested BSR/CSR from Toolpusher's Panel on Blue Pod. Good tests.

Note: On 05/12/2016 at 17:02 hrs; Gust Woldvedt (Chevron) received approval for a 24 hour extension on the BSR pressure tests for the period through midnight on 05/13/2016. This approval was granted by Kassim Y. Kassim (BSEE).

05/13/2016: TIH with RTTS overshot. Latched onto and unset RTTS packer. Flow check well and TOH with RTTS. TIH with 10-5/8" drilling BHA from 11;522' to 15;959'. Tests recorded and verified using IPT Suretec software. Pressure tested BOP on 5-7/8" drill pipe with 15.9 ppg SBM from Driller's Panel on Yellow Pod. Test pressures: surface equipment 250/11;600 psi; BOP/FSVs 250/9;700 psi; annular 250/5;200 psi - good tests. TIH and place 6-5/8" test joints spaced out across BOP in preparation for BOP pressure testing.

Note: On May 13; 2016 at 20:16 hrs CDT Kassim Kassim (BSEE) notified Justin Cremer (CVX) "Please be informed that we concur with the attached USIT log evaluation report for the 14"x13‐7/8"x13‐3/4" tieback and 14" Liner were interpreted within the 90% remaining body wall & the 11 7/8" to have the maximum 4% wear. Therefore; we have no objection for Chevron to move forward with the SS BOP test; trip to condition the hole clean; and then continue with drilling operations as per initial APD approval.Once the BOP pressure test is completed; please forward the BSR & BOP pressure tests results to our Supervisory Inspector; Phillip Couvillion for review and acceptance"

05/14/2016: Pressure tested BOP on 5-7/8" drill pipe with 15.9 ppg SBM from Driller's Panel on Yellow Pod. Tests recorded and verified using IPT Suretec software. Test pressures BOP/FSVs 250/9;700 psi; annular 250/5;200 psi. TIH with 10-5/8" drilling BHA to 26;856'. Perform diverter function test from Driller's Panel and Toolpusher's Panel. Good tests. TIH from 26;856' to 29;012'. Washed and reamed to bottom at 29;294'. Circulated bottoms up to 3;000' below BOP.

05/15/2016: Tripped out of hole (TOH) above 11-7/8" shoe. Attempted to break circulation down drill string and had plugged string. Unplugged string and circulated drill string volume. Tripped in hole (TIH) to 29;294' BHA. Drilled 10-5/8" hole from 29;294' to 29;660'.

05/16/2016: Drilled 10-5/8" hole section from 29;660' to 29;925' (TD) with 15.9 ppg MW.

05/17/2016: Circulated hole clean from 29;925'. Flow checked the well (well static) and then began to pump out of hole from 29;925' to 29;012'. TOH from 29;012' to 6;309'. 

05/18/2016: TOH with 10-5/8" drilling BHA from 6;309' to surface. TIH with 4-1/2" cement stinger from surface to 26;882'. Started circulating bottoms up.

05/19/2016: Continued circulating bottoms up prior to cementing P&A open hole plug # 1. Made up the cement stand; and spotted P&A open hole plug # 1. Mixed and pumped 1387 cu ft of 16.8 ppg cement slurry. Cement slurry density 16.8 lb/gal; yield 1.36 cu ft/sk; mix fluid concentration 4.974 gal/sk. TOH to 27;981' and spotted P&A plug # 2. Mixed and pumped 1387 cu ft of 16.8 ppg cement slurry. Cement slurry density 16.8 lb/gal; yield 1.357 cu ft/sk; mix fluid concentration 4.966 gal/sk. TOH from 27;981' to 26;120'. No losses incurred during cement jobs. TOH to 25;378'.

05/20/2016: Continued TOH from 23;578' to surface. Tested P&A open hole plugs 1 & 2 to 1;500 psi offline (good test). TIH with 11-7/8" EZSV to 11;432'.

05/21/2016: TIH with 11-7/8" EZSV from 11;432' to 26;020'. At 26;020' observed 25k over slack off weight. Attempted to set EZSV with no success. TOH wet from 25;175' to 23;385'. TOH with 11-7/8" EZSV to 13;572'.

Note: Cesar Fuenmayor (Chevron) received verbal approval from Michael Henry (BSEE) on May 21; 2016; at 3:06:05 PM CDT to move the retainer (11-7/8" EZSV) approximately 1;000' up hole to 25;100' contingent upon a PE Certification prior to performing this operation.

05/22/2016: Trip out of hole (TOH) with 11-7/8" cement retainer from 13;572' MD to surface in 15.9 ppg SBM. Trip in hole (TIH) with 10-5/8" cleanout BHA from surface to 736' MD. 

05/23/2016: TIH with 10-5/8" cleanout BHA from 736' MD to 25;250' MD. Wash and ream from 25;250' MD to 25;033' MD with 10-5/8" cleanout BHA. TOH with 10-5/8" cleanout BHA from 25;033' MD to 7;954' MD. 

05/24/2016: TOH with 10-5/8" cleanout BHA from 7;954' MD to surface. TIH with 11-7/8" cement retainer from surface to 23;334' MD. 

05/25/2016: TIH with 11-7/8" cement retainer from 23;334' MD to 25;095' MD. Set 11-7/8" cement retainer at 25;095' MD. Positive pressure test 11-7/8" cement retainer to 1;500 psi for 15 minutes with 15.9 ppg SBM; good test. Perform inflow test on 11-7/8" cement retainer to 2;450 psi with 15.9 ppg SBM; good test. Mix and pump 57 bbls (320 cu ft) of 16.8 ppg cement. Displace with 651 bbls of 15.9 ppg SBM; placing cement from 25;080' MD to 24;580' MD. TOH with 11-7/8" cement retainer running tool from 24;580' MD to 23;700' MD. Mix and pump 66 bbls (370 cu ft) of 16.8 ppg cement. Displace with 620 bbls of 15.9 ppg SBM; placing cement from 23;700' MD to 23;200' MD. TOH with 10-5/8" cement retainer running tool from 23;700' MD to 20;470' MD. 

05/26/2016: TOH with 11-7/8" cement retainer running tool from 20;470' MD to 18;300' MD. Mix and pump 80 bbls (449 cu ft) of 16.6 ppg cement. Displace with 457 bbls of 15.9 ppg SBM; placing cement from 18;300' MD to 17;800' MD. TOH with 11-7/8" cement retainer running tool from 18;300' MD to surface. TIH with 14" cement retainer from surface to 11;814' MD. Set 14" cement retainer at 11;814' MD.

05/27/2016: Perform positive pressure test on 14" cement retainer to 1;000 psi for 15 minutes with 15.9 ppg SBM; good test. Mix and pump 75 bbls (421 cu ft) of 16.6 ppg cement. Displace with 284 bbls of 15.9 SBM; placing cement from 11;814' MD to 11;314' MD. TOH with 14" cementer retainer running tool from 11;814' MD to 5;360' MD. Displace choke line; kill line; boost line; well; and surface equipment from 15.9 ppg SBM to seawater. Mix and pump 46 bbls (258 cu ft) of 16.6 ppg cement. Displace with 98 bbls of seawater; placing cement from 5;360' MD to 5;060' MD. TOH with 14" cement retainer running tool from 5;360' MD to surface. TIH with riser brush assembly from surface to 5;030' MD.

05/28/2016: Jet BOP with riser brush assembly. TOH with riser brush assembly from 5;030' MD to 4;900' MD. Spot 20 bbls of wellhead preservation fluid at 4;900' MD. TOH with riser brush assembly from 4;900' MD to surface. Unlatch BOP from wellhead at 20:45 hrs.

05/29/2016: Release tensioner ring from slip joint and lower to BOP cart. Traverse BOP cart to well center. Rig down drape hoses and storm loops. Unlock and lay out telescopic joint. Pull LMRP/BOP on marine riser from 4;764' to 1;724' (31 of 55 joints pulled).

05/30/2016: Continue to pull LMRP/BOP on marine riser from 1;724' to surface. Land out BOP on transporter and rig down riser handling equipment. Jet BOP in moonpool. Transport BOP to set back area and secure. Commence transit from Gibson #2 KC-96 to Dawn Marie #1 GB-998.

"},{"   ":3,"WELL_NAME":"  001","API12":608084005200,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-11-08","TEXT_REMARK":"11/08/2015: Pumped 413 bbls (541 bbls or 3;308 cu ft foamed down hole) of 16.4 ppg (12.5 ppg down hole) lead foamed slurry. 11/13/2015: Tripped in hole with 22" casing from 4;961' to 9;547'. Pumped 200 bbls of 13.3 ppg spacer. Pumped 986 bbls of 16.4 ppg lead cement (1;164 bbls or 6;536 cu ft down hole foamed; pH reading was 13.7 at end of pumping sequence). Returns verified at mudline. Displaced cement with 251 bbls of seawater. Tripped out of hole with MRLD; inner and landing strings from 9;272' to 9;008'. Displaced well with 1;780 bbls of 11.0 ppg mud. Tripped out of hole with MRLD; inner and landing strings from 9;008' to surface. 

11/14/2015: Soak tested both PODs in non-drilling mode. Stacked lower marine riser package on blowout preventers. Functioned BSR/CSR from Blue and Yellow Pods. Functioned emergency hydraulic backup system from key. 
"},{"   ":4,"WELL_NAME":"  001","API12":608084005200,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-11-15","TEXT_REMARK":"11/15/2015: Completed pre checks and began BOP Stump test. Completed ROV intervention tests. Completed EDS 1 dry fire; EDS 2 dry fire; and EDS 3 wet fire tests.

11/16/2015: Continue pre-deployment BOP stump test. Completed the pre deployment EHBS and accumulator drawdown. Started function testing the BOP.

11/17/2015: Complete pre-deployment BOP stump test. Stage riser equipment to rig floor.

11/18/2015: Continue pre-deployment pressure testing. Began precharging accumulator bottles to subsea pressure values.

11/19/2015: Completed pre-charging accumulator bottles. Change out diverter element and pressure tested diverter packer. Continue with BOP pre-run check list.

11/20/2015: Continue with pre-deployment checks on BOP and prepare for deployment.  Pressured up BOP. Hooked up lines on rig floor to test riser joints while tripping.

11/21/2015: Test mud boost line and riser conduit lines. Test choke & kill line. Run BOP/LMRP on marine riser from 179' to 2;159' while testing Boost (250/5;000 psi) and Riser Conduits (5;000 psi). Test choke & kill lines to (250/11;600 psi). Run BOP on marine riser from 2;159' to 3;149'.
"},{"   ":5,"WELL_NAME":"  001","API12":608084005200,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-11-22","TEXT_REMARK":"1/22/2015: Run BOP on marine riser from 3;149' to 4;769'. Pressure test boost; choke; kill and rigid conduit lines (good test). Make up slip joint and landing joint. Install drape hoses and storm loops.

11/23/2015: Pressure test choke and kill lines (good test). Move vessel to wellhead. Land and latch BOP onto wellhead. Unlock and scope out slip joint. Lay out landing joint. Perform ROV intervention test by closing blind shear rams and testing 22" casing to 4;500 psi for 30 mins (good test). Install diverter. Rig down riser running equipment. Slip & cut drill line while testing choke and kill manifold offline. Perform diverter flow test. Trip in hole with Dual Cam/ Subsea BOP Test Tool (SBOPTT) assembly from surface to 2;746'.

11/24/2015: Continue to trip in hole with Dual Cam/ SBOPTT assembly to 6;145'. Perform accumulator draw down test (good test). Pressure test BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe with 8.6 ppg seawater (good test). Function test BOPs from Toolpusher's panel on Blue Pod and from Driller's panel on Yellow Pod (good test). Functioned diverter on Driller's and Toolpusher's panels (good test). Released Dual Cam and pressure tested BSRs and connector to 12;300 psi high/ 250 psi low (good test). Perform BOP emergency hydraulic back-up system test to 1;000 psi (good test). Engage dual cam and unseat SBOPTT. Pull out of hole with Dual Cam/ SBOPTT from 6;316' to surface. Function test shear rams from Toolpusher's panel on Blue Pod and from Driller's panel on Yellow Pod (good test). Pressure test top drive manual IBOP and begin pressure test on top drive lower auto IBOP.

11/25/2015: Pressure test top drive upper and lower IBOPs to 250 psi low/ 11;600 psi high (good test). Successfully test kelly hose to 250 psi low/ 7;400 psi high. Rig down test lines and run in hole with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from surface to 9;250'. Wash down from 9;250' with 100 gpm at 72 psi. Tag cement at 9;334'. 

11/26/2015: Displace boost; choke and kill lines with 11.1 ppg SBM. Displace drill string with 11.1 ppg SBM. Ream through stringer at 9;334' and wash down to hard cement at 9;443'. Drill cement from 9;443' to 9;454' while displacing wellbore. Finish displacement at 9;454' and line up pit system for SBM returns. Hold choke drill. Drill cement to 9;575'. Drill 10' of new formation to 9;585'; circulate bottoms up. Perform LOT to 12.7 ppg equivalent mud weight (805 psi). Drill 18-1/8" hole from 9;585' to 9;750'. Activate reamer. Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 9;750' to 10;146'.

11/27/2015: Continue to drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 10;146' to 12;322'.

11/28/2015: Continue to drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section from 12;322' to 12;439'. Observe 2 bbl gain in active system. Flow check. Gain 13.7 bbls in trip tank over 35 minutes. Shut in and establish stabilized SICP 470 psi. Bump float and establish SIDPP 500 psi. Weight up active system to 12.3 ppg KWM. Bring well on choke using Wait & Weight Method holding 510 psi (470 + 40 psi SF) constant on kill line until pumps up to speed. Follow drill pipe pressure schedule until KWM at bit. Increased SIDPP incrementally to 350 psi to stabilize a 2-3 bbl/hr pit gain over barite addition. Continue circulating out kick at 20 SPM; maintaining FCP. Work pipe every 2 hrs to ensure still free.
"},{"   ":6,"WELL_NAME":"  001","API12":608084005200,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-11-29","TEXT_REMARK":"11/29/2015: Circulated 12.3 ppg kill weight mud (KWM) with well on choke until losing returns. "},{"   ":9,"WELL_NAME":"  001","API12":608084005201,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-12-13","TEXT_REMARK":"12/13/2015: Drilled with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 10;551' to 11;399'. Observed 12.5 bbl gain in wellbore. "},{"   ":10,"WELL_NAME":"  001","API12":608084005201,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-12-20","TEXT_REMARK":"12/20/2015: Continued to wait on cement. Tripped in the hole from 8;181' to 9;156'. Positive pressure tested cement plug using 11.8 ppg SBM down the drill pipe with rig pumps at .5 bpm to 1500 psi with a total of 13.6 bbls pumped. Pressure held; indicating a good test. Bled off pressure and returned 12.2 bbls of SBM. Flow checked and well was static. Tripped out of the hole from 9;099' to 4;870'. Flow checked the well; well static. Tripped out the hole from 4;870' to surface.

12/21/2015: Tripped in the hole with 6-5/8" cement diverter and riser brush assembly from surface to 5;319'. Successfully performed negative test for 30 minutes:

    Initial pressure - wellhead 3;200 psi; standpipe 1;233 psi
    Final pressure - wellhead 2;240 psi; standpipe 0 psi

Displaced wellbore and riser from 11.8 ppg SBM to seawater. Pumped 300' balanced plug from 5;350' to 5;050'. Pumped 108 bbls of 16.4 ppg cement (112 bbls; 629 cu ft; 593 total sacks) with full returns. Displaced with 126 bbls seawater. Tripped out of the hole with 6-5/8" cement stinger from 5;350' to surface. 

12/22/2015: Cleaned diverter housing and rotary pan. Unlatched BOP and LMRP. Moved vessel 500 feet at 180 degrees to safe handling area. Removed storm loops; and drape hoses. Began to pull riser from 4;872' to 4;499'. 

12/23/2015: Pulled riser and BOP from 4;499' to surface. ROV completed the clear bottom survey of the Gibson well. End of well.
"},{"   ":11,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608084005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2015-12-27","TEXT_REMARK":"12/27/2015: Wait on weather.

Note: Mr. Cesar Fuenmayor (Chevron) notified Mr. Neil Funwie (BSEE) with intent to stump test BOP in 72 hours.

12/28/2015: Wait on weather.

12/29/2015: Tripped in hole with 30" x 32" BHA and 36" Conductor from surface to mudline at 4;891'. Positioned the rig over location. Jetted the 36" casing 310' below the mud line from 4;912' to 5;222' with seawater. Released the CADA tool. Drilled with 30" x 32" BHA from 5;222' to 5;345'.

12/30/2015: Drilled 30" x 32" hole from 5;345' to 6;225' with saltwater. Displaced well to 11.5 ppg low fluid loss water-based mud (WBM). Pulled out of the hole and washed the LPWHH with seawater and the PBL sub. Tripped out of the hole from 6;225' to 118'.

12/31/2015: Tripped out of hole with 30" x 32" BHA from 118' to surface. Ran 1;273' of 28" casing. Ran 1;136' of 5-7/8" inner string. Tripped in on landing string to 4;471'. ROV noticed 28" casing pup collapse; tripped out to 1;057' and laid down the casing hanger; pup joint; and a full joint of casing.

01/01/2016: Tripped the 5-7/8" inner string out of the 28" casing. Ran 1 joint of 28" casing; backup casing hanger; and pup joint. Ran 5-7/8" inner string from surface to 1;135'. Made up the 28" casing hanger running tool. Tripped in with 28" casing on landing string to 5;060'. Displaced the landing and inner strings and casing shoe track to 11.5 ppg WBM. Tripped in with 28" casing from 5;060' to 6;140'. Made up the cement stand and circulated prior to the cement job.

01/02/2016: Landed and latched the 28" casing hanger in the LPWHH with a shoe depth of 6;178'. Cemented 28" casing with 800 bbls/ 4;492 cu ft of 12.5 ppg foamed lead cement and 152 bbls/ 853 cu ft of 16.4 ppg tail cement. Returns visually confirmed at mudline. Displaced cement with 171 bbls of seawater. Floats did not hold. Waited on cement 12 hours. Released the casing hanger running tool. Tripped out with the landing and inner strings from 6;140' to 1;136'.

01/15/2016: Stacked up LMRP to the BOP. Function tested BSR/CSR from Driller's panel on Blue Pod and Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod. "},{"   ":14,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608084005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-01-17","TEXT_REMARK":"01/17/2016: Continued to wait on weather. Continued running Lower Marine Riser Package (LMRP) and Blow Out Preventer (BOP) on marine riser from 2;174' to 4;887'.

01/18/2016: Moved rig over wellhead. Landed and latched BOP to wellhead with 50;000 down. Closed Blind Shear Ram (BSR) using ROV. Tested casing and BSRs to 4400 psi high/250 low for 30 min (good test). Opened BSR. 

Note: On 01/18/2016 @ 22:39 hrs; Gust Woldvedt (Chevron) received approval from Peter Botros (BSEE) to test BOPs without the acoustic system.

01/19/2016: Installed diverter. Tripped in hole with Dril-Quip Subsea Blowout Preventer Test Tool (SBOPTT) and Dual Cam tool from surface to 6;319'. Tested BOPs on 6-5/8" DP with 8.6 ppg SW from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod (11;600 psi high/250 psi low). Completed 9 of 24 tests (good tests).

01/20/2016: Completed remainder of BOP pressure and function tests (good tests). Tripped out of hole with SBOPTT and Dual Cam to 360'.

01/21/2016: Trip out of hole to surface with SBOPTT/Dual Cam tool. Tripped in hole with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA. Tagged TOC at 10;368'. Displaced boost line; C/K lines; surface equipment to 12.5 ppg WBM. Displaced well from 11.0 ppg to 12.5 ppg WBM while drilling cement. Drilled cement from 10;368' to 10;454'.

01/22/2016: Continued to drill cement inside casing from 10;454' and exited shoe at 10;472'. Drilled 10' of new formation. Performed Formation Integrity Test (FIT) to 13.2 ppg equivalent mud weight (426 psi with 12.5 ppg surface mud weight). Drilled from 10;510' to 10;556' and observed 100 psi standpipe pressure drop. Lost signal with MWD tools. Tripped out of hole. Tripped in hole from surface to 648' with new 18-1/8" x 21" BHA.

01/23/2016: Tripped in hole with 18-1/8" x 21" directional BHA from 648' to 10;491'. Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section to 10;919'.

01/29/2016: Bled off pressure to the cement unit. Floats did not hold. Closed bleed off choke. Waited on cement nine hours. Bled off pressure and monitored static well at the cement unit. Tripped out three stands and chased two foam wiper balls and a 100 bbl scouring pill with two string volumes of 12.6 ppg WBM. "},{"   ":18,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608084005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-02-14","TEXT_REMARK":"02/14/2016: Displaced cement with 14.1 ppg SBM. Had partial losses throughout displacement. TIH from 11;162' to 12;529'.

Obtained slow circulating rates (SCRs) and choke-line friction (CLFs) and conducted a choke drill. Drilled shoe track and reamed 19" rathole. Drilled 10' of new formation to 20;660'. Circulated cuttings above BHA.

02/17/2016: Pump up 14.33 ppg ESD. Break circulation and test lines to 2;000 psi. Close annular and perform FIT with 14.1 ppg to 1;558 psi for a 15.56 ppg FIT. Pump up 15.86 ppg ESD after FIT. Drilled from 20;660' to 20;670'. Activated reamer; took 25k overpull against shoe to confirm reamer activation. Continued drilling 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole section from 20;670 to 21;046'.

02/18/2016: Drilled 14-1/2" hole section from 21; 046' to 21;905'. Begin weighting up from 14.1 ppg to 14.3 ppg at 21;168'. Stuck pipe at 21;619' while coming up to make connection. Jarred free. Weighted up from 14.3 ppg to 14.6 pgg. Exited BOS at ~21;895'. Drilled 10' out of salt and flow check; well static.

02/19/2016: Drilled 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole section from 21;905' to 23;802'. Began weighting up from 14.6 ppg to 14.8 ppg at 23;674' due to excessive torque when back reaming.

02/20/2016: Drilled 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole section from 23;802' to 24;350'. Continued weighting up to 14.8 ppg. Continued drilling 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole section from 24;350' to 24;885'. Weighted up active system from 14.8 ppg to 14.9 ppg SBM. Tripped out of hole from 24;885' to 22;646'.

Note: Peter M. Botros (BSEE) was notified at 10:00 AM on 02/20/2016 by Jason Myers (Chevron) that while unloading 5-7/8" drill pipe; the crane operator utilized the crane cradle to turn the pipe causing the plastic thread protector to fall off and into the water. The item was not retrieved.
"},{"   ":19,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608084005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-02-21","TEXT_REMARK":"02/21/2016: Tripped out of hole from 22;646' to 20;166; flow checked before entering shoe; well static. Closed circulating sub; pumped slug and tripped out of the hole from 7;860' to 767'. 

Note: David Cain (Chevron) received 24 hr extension for BSR/CSR function from Peter Botros (BSEE) on 02/21/2016 @ 5:12 pm. The BSR/CSR function is now due by Midnight on 02/22/2016. The BSR/CSR will be functioned before running the 14" liner.

02/25/2016: Tripped in hole with 14" casing from 9;124' to 23;512'. Observed excessive drag at 23;512'. Attempted to wash through tight spot without success. Picked up to 23;428'. Washed and reamed with 14" liner from 23;428' to 23;285'.

Released running tool from hanger. Tripped out of hole with 14" hanger running tool from 18;053' to 13;300'.

02/27/2016: Tripped out of hole with hanger running tool from 13;300' to surface. Did not recover wiper plugs on running tool. Picked up and tripped in hole with 12-1/4" cleanout assembly from surface to 10;697'.

Note: Cesar Fuenmayor (Chevron) received approval on 02/27/2016 @ 10:52 am from Aaron Campbell (BSEE) to set the 14" liner 200' higher in the KC 96 well 002 at 24;700' RKB.
"},{"   ":20,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608084005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-02-28","TEXT_REMARK":"02/28/2016: Tripped in hole (TIH) with 12-1/4" cleanout BHA from 10;697' to 22;184' MD in 14.9 ppg SBM monitoring well for proper displacement; well static. TOH with 12-1/4" BHA from 14;478' MD to surface monitoring well for proper displacement; well static. Function tested blind shear ram (BSR)/casing shear ram (CSR) from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; and from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod; tests successful. Ran in hole with caliper tool on wireline from surface to 24;425' MD monitoring well for proper displacement; well static. Logged from 24;425' to 4;912' MD and pulled caliper tool to surface.

03/02/2016: TIH with 13-5/8" FasDrill packer from surface to 20;882' MD in 14.9 ppg SBM monitoring well for proper displacement; well static. Set and pressure tested FasDrill packer at 20;882' MD.

03/03/2016: Continued to pressure test FasDrill packer with 14.9 ppg SBM. Performed injection test through packer at various pump rates. TOH with FasDrill packer setting tool from 20;882' to 11;274' MD while monitoring well for proper displacement; well static.

Note: On 03/03/2016; Gust Woldtvedt (Chevron) notified BSEE Lake Jackson District via email that "the Driller's panel for the BOP is currently unable to function the BOP."

03/04/2016: Continued to TOH with FasDrill packer setting tool from 11;274' MD to surface in 14.9 ppg SBM while monitoring well for proper displacement; well static. TIH with replacement FasDrill packer setting tool from surface to 19;016' MD while monitoring well for proper displacement; well static.

Note: On 03/04/2016; Gust Woldtvedt (Chevron) notified BSEE Lake Jackson District via email that; "On March 03 2016 BOP control system reported a failure of the Power Supply Module (CPM) module fault in the Drillers BOP control panel. CPM modules inside the Drillers BOP panel is used to communicate and supply power to the input/output (I/O) modules. Since the CPM module on rack 6 was faulty all I/O modules were turned off on rack 6 only. The rig tripped pipe above the BOP to fix the CPM.
On March 04 2016 the rig crew replaced the CPM module on rack 6 and restored power and communication to all I/O modules on rack 6. The Drillers BOP control panel is now 100% healthy and functional. The BOP control system is in the normal healthy state." 

03/05/2016: Continued TIH with FasDrill packer setting tool from 19;016' to 20;876' MD in 14.9 ppg SBM while monitoring well for proper displacement; well static. TIH with casing scraper and jetting assembly from surface to 4;026' MD.
"},{"   ":21,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608084005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-03-06","TEXT_REMARK":"03/06/2016: Tripped in hole (TIH) with casing scraper and jetting assembly from 4;026' to 18;006' MD in 14.9 ppg SBM. Waited on cement while monitoring pressures; well static.
"},{"   ":22,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608084005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-03-13","TEXT_REMARK":"03/13/2016: Waited on cement. Attempted to bleed off pressure through the choke in increments. Pressure continued to build back after bled off. Waited on cement while monitoring pressures. Preformed second attempt to bleed off pressure in increments through the choke. Bled off a total of 108.2 bbls with pressure decreasing with each increment.

03/14/2016: Opened choke and bled off remaining pressure. Opened annular and monitored bleed back until flow stopped. Flow checked well - static. Mixed and pumped 75 bbls (421 cu ft) of 16.6 ppg cement and spotted 500' balanced cement plug from 24;360' to 23;860'. Displaced with 617 bbls of 14.9 ppg SBM with rig pumps. Tripped out of hole from 24;360' to above cement plug at 23;072'. Flow checked well - static. Tripped out of hole with FasDrill stinger from 23;072' to 18;329'.

03/15/2016: Tripped out of hole with FasDrill stinger to surface. Tripped in hole with test joints and multi-purpose tool. Washed BOP. Pressure tested BOPs and surface equipment on 6-5/8" drill pipe with 14.9 ppg SBM from Toolpusher's Panel on Yellow Pod utilizing IPT. Test pressures: annular 200-300/5;500 psi; rams 200-300/8;200 psi; surface 200-300/9;800 psi. 

Note: On 03/15/2016; David Cain (Chevron) received approval from Mike Henry (BSEE) to postpone the casing test in order to allow additional time for the cement to cure while testing BOPs. The following is required:
1) This period is not to exceed 24 hours without contacting the Lake Jackson District.
2) Document this verbal approval in the WAR and on the drilling report.
3) Provide this District with information regarding the specifics of the cement job performed. In particular; were there any problems encountered while pumping the cement job?

03/16/2016: Completed BOP pressure testing from Toolpusher's Panel on Yellow Pod - good tests. Function tested BOPs on 5-7/8" drill pipe from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod; and Toolpusher's Panel on Blue Pod - good test. Function tested diverter from Driller's Panel and Toolpusher's Panel - good tests. Performed BSR/CSR function test from Driller's Panel on Yellow Pod and from Toolpusher's Panel on Blue Pod - good tests. Tripped out of hole with NBP on multi-purpose tool to surface. Performed 14" casing and blind shear ram pressure test to 250 psi low for 5 minutes; 5;600 psi high for 35 minutes with 14.9 ppg SBM - good test. Tripped in hole with 13-3/4" casing tieback from surface to 616'. 

03/17/2016: Tripped in hole with 13-3/4" x 13-7/8" casing tieback from 616' to 11;408'. Partial power loss at 23:00 hrs when #4 and #6 generators shut down due to cooling water issue.

03/18/2016: Tripped in hole with 13-3/4" x 13-7/8" x 14" casing tieback from 11;419' to 13;063'. Tripped in with 4-1/2" x 5-7/8" inner string from surface to 12;532'. Picked up and made up casing hanger seal assembly running tool to inner string and hanger. Tripped in casing on 6-5/8" landing string from 13;063' to 14;076'.

03/19/2016: Tripped in hole with 13-3/4" x 13-7/8" x 14" casing tieback from 14;076' to 17;971'. Landed out 14" tieback hanger at 4;906'. "},{"   ":23,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608084005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-03-20","TEXT_REMARK":"03/20/2016: Continued tripping out of hole with 13-3/4" x 13-7/8" x 14" tieback landing and inner string from 12;761' to surface. 03/26/2016: Tripped in hole with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from surface to 16;340'. Began pressure testing BOP on 5-7/8" drill pipe with 15.1 ppg SBM from Toolpusher's Panel on Blue Pod. Tested annular to 250/5;400 psi; rams to 250/9;900 psi; surface equipment to 250/11;600 psi.

Note: On 03/26/2016; Kassim Kassim (BSEE) provided written approval to pressure test the SS BOP and then to commence drilling the 12-1/4" x 14-1-2" hole section as previously approved.
"},{"   ":24,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608084005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-03-27","TEXT_REMARK":"03/27/2016: Continued to pressure test BOP with 15.1 ppg SBM from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod; per IPT test procedure to 250 psi low/ 5;400 psi high annular; 250 psi low/ 9;900 psi high rams; and 250 psi low/ 11;600 psi high surface equipment. Note: On 03/29/2016; Cesar Fuenmayor (Chevron) received email approval from Mr. Kassim Kassim ( BSEE) to function test the BSR/CSRs; BOP and diverter every 14 days. 

03/30/2016: Continued to drill 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" hole section from 26;027' to 26;373' MD with 15.4 ppg SBM.

03/31/2016: Continued to drill 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" hole section from 26;373' to 26;523' MD with 15.4 ppg SBM. Monitored well on trip tank and observed 5.7 bbls; gained in an hour. Shut in annular; located against annular; and shut in middle pipe ram. Flushed choke and kill line with 15.4 ppg SBM and obtain choke and kill line friction while monitoring well with wellhead pressure gauge. Open middle pipe ram and obtained stabilized shut in casing pressure (SICP) of 240 psi and shut in drill pipe pressure (SIDPP) of 130 psi. Began executing wait and weight method while circulating kill mud weight (KMW) of 15.5 ppg SBM.

04/01/2016: Continued circulating KMW of 15.5 ppg SBM per wait and weight method. Monitored well; well static. Displaced riser to 15.5 ppg SBM. Closed middle pipe ram and swept stack. Opened middle pipe ram and monitored well; well static. Staged up pumps and circulated bottoms up.

04/02/2016: Continued circulating bottoms up with 15.5 ppg SBM. Drilled 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" hole section from 26;523' to 26;654' MD while weighting up from 15.5 to 15.7 ppg SBM.
"},{"   ":25,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608084005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-04-03","TEXT_REMARK":"04/03/2016: Drilled 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" hole from 26;654' to 26;975' with 15.7 ppg SBM.

04/04/2016: Drilled 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" hole from 26;975' to section total depth at 26;980'. Circulated hole clean and weighted up to 15.8 ppg SBM. Pumped out of hole with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 26;980' to 24;138'.

04/05/2016: Pumped out of hole with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 24;138' to 17;288'. Tripped out of hole from 17;288' to 2;606'.

04/06/2016: Tripped out of hole with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" from 2;606' to surface. Tripped in hole with 11-7/8" liner from surface to 3;559'. Tripped in hole with 11-7/8" liner on landing string from 3;559' to 4;190'.

04/07/2016: Tripped in hole with 11-7/8" liner on landing string from 4;190' to 26;310'.

04/08/2016: Tripped in hole with 11-7/8" liner on landing string from 26;310' to 26;853'. Washed and reamed 11-7/8" liner from 26;853' to 26;970'. Mixed and pumped 90 bbls/ 505 cu ft (59 bbls/ 332 cu ft in annulus and 31 bbls/ 173 cu ft in liner) of 16.6 ppg cement. Displaced cement with 990 bbls 15.8 ppg SBM with partial returns. Set 11-7/8" liner hanger. Waited on cement. Released liner hanger running tool.

04/09/2016: Tested liner top packer to 1;500 psi for 5 minutes. Good test. Tripped out hole with 11-7/8" hanger running tool from 23;460' to surface. Function test BSR/CSR from Toolpusher's Panel on Yellow Pod. Utilized IPT to pressure test casing/BSR to 250 psi low (5 minutes - good test)/ 1;500 psi high (30 minutes - good test). Tripped in hole with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from surface to 155'. Began pressure testing surface equipment to 11;600 psi offline.
"},{"   ":26,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608084005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-04-10","TEXT_REMARK":"04/10/2016: Trip in hole (TIH) with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 1;101' MD to 16;102' MD. Pressure test choke manifold and surface equipment to 250 psi low/ 11;600 psi high from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod. All tests performed with 15.8 ppg SBM utilizing IPT SureTec software; all good tests. TIH from 16;102' MD to 16;348' MD. Perform BOP pressure test on 6-5/8" drill pipe at 16;348' MD to 250 psi low/ 9;700 psi high from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod. All tests performed with 15.8 ppg (SBM) utilizing IPT SureTec software; all tests good. Perform Diverter function test from Driller's Panel; Blue Pod; test good. TIH from 16;348' MD to 21;940' MD.

04/11/2016: TIH with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 21;940' MD to top of cement (TOC) at 26;702' MD. Perform choke drill. Drill out cement in 11-7/8" shoe track with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 26;702' MD to 26;970' MD. Drill 10' new formation with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 26;980' MD to 26;990' MD. Circulate bottoms up to above BOP. Attempted formation integrity test (FIT) to 1;263 psi (16.7 ppg equivalent mud weight) at 26;970' TVD with 15.8 ppg SBM; formation leaked off at 250 psi (15.97 equivalent mud weight).

04/12/2016: Monitor flowback from ballooning well (14.6 bbls back). Monitor well on trip tank; well static. Trip out of hole (TOH) with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 26;990' MD to 17;879' MD. 

04/13/2016: TOH with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 17;879' MD to surface. Perform BSR/CSR function test from Toolpusher's Panel; Blue Pod. TIH with 4-1/2" cement stinger from surface to 168' MD.

Note: Chevron received verbal approval from Kassim Kassim (BSEE) on 04/13/2016 @ 15:16 hrs to squeeze the 11-7/8" casing shoe with 60 bbls using 3;400' of 4-1/4" stinger; WOC; then drill out the cement including 10' of new formation and repeat FIT.

04/14/2016: TIH with 4-1/2" cement stinger from 168' MD to 26;990' MD. Mix and pump 100 bbls (561.4 cu ft) of 16.6 ppg cement. Spot balanced cement plug from 26;990' MD to 25;356' MD. TOH with 4-1/2" cement stinger from 26;990' MD to 25;237' MD. 

04/15/2016: Close annular and pump 29 bbls of 16.1 ppg SBM squeezing 20 bbls (162 cu ft) of 16.6 ppg cement into formation at 1;200 psi; 80 bbls (449 cu ft) left inside 11-7/8" casing. Hold 1;170 psi while waiting on cement. Open annular and circulate bottoms up to 3;000' below BOP. Close annular and circulate through choke and kill lines. Open annular and flow check well; well static. TOH with 4-1/2" cement stinger from 25;237' MD to 13;963' MD.  

04/16/2016: TOH with 4-1/2" cement stinger from 13;963' MD to 4;574' MD. Perform BSR/CSR function test from Driller's Panel; Yellow Pod. TOH with 4-1/2" cement stinger from 4;574' MD to surface. TIH with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from surface to 12;182' MD.
"},{"   ":27,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608084005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-04-17","TEXT_REMARK":"04/17/2016: Tripped in hole with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" drilling assembly (assy). 04/18/2016: Wash and ream to top of firm cement at 26;145'. Drill cement from 26;145' to 26;978' (hard cement started at 26;265'). Wash and ream open hole to TD at 26;990'. Drill 10' of new formation from 26;990' to 27;000'.

04/23/2016: Drilled 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" hole from 28;218' to 28;370'. Treated losses with LCM sweeps while circulating. Circulated bottoms up.
"},{"   ":28,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608084005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-04-24","TEXT_REMARK":"04/24/2016: Continued circulating bottoms up (CBU) with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA in 15.8 ppg SBM. 04/25/2016: Continued TOH with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 13;906' to 5;204' MD in 15.8 ppg SBM. Washed BOP while reciprocating drill pipe (DP). TOH from 5;204' MD to surface. Ran in hole (RIH) with wireline BHA #1 from surface to 28;386' MD. Logged from 28;386' to 27;164' MD.

"},{"   ":29,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608084005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-05-01","TEXT_REMARK":"05/01/2016: Tripped in hole (TIH) with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 26;892' to 28;370' MD in 15.8 ppg SBM. Note: Daniel Gonzalez; Casey Conklin and Alvin S. Obrien from BSEE Lake Jackson District arrived on rig at 08:34 hrs to inspect rig; paper work and recent incident with the parted sling. Departed rig at 14:22 hrs.;

05/06/2016: Continued obtaining pressure and fluid samples with wireline BHA #2 in 15.9 ppg SBM. TOH with wireline BHA #2 from 28;700' to 23;000' MD.

Note: Cesar Fuenmayor (Chevron) received approval for a 72 hour extension on the casing and BSR pressure tests for the period from May 9 through midnight on May 12; 2016; due to ongoing intensive formation evaluation logging operations. This approval was granted by Kassim Y. Kassim (BSEE) on May 6; 2016; at 3:46:52 PM CDT.

05/07/2016: Continued TOH with wireline BHA #2 from 23;000' MD to surface in 15.9 ppg SBM. RIH with wireline BHA #3 from surface to 29;195' MD. Obtained sidewall cores with wireline BHA #3 per requirements.
"},{"   ":30,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608084005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-05-08","TEXT_REMARK":"05/08/2016: Continued obtaining sidewall cores with wireline (WL) assembly #3. Ran in hole to next core point and continue obtaining rotary sidewall core samples as per Chevron Geology and Geophysics (CVX G&G).

05/09/2016: Continued obtaining sidewall cores as per CVX G&G. Pull out of hole with WL assembly #3 to surface. Picked up and ran in hole (RIH) with WL Run #4. Continued performing open hole evaluations as per CVX G&G.

05/10/2016: Pulled out of the hole with WL Run #4. RIH with WL assembly #5; in lieu of casing pressure test. Logged up from 26;470' to 23;450'. RIH to 25;000' and encountered tool failure. Pulled out of the hole to troubleshoot tools. RIH to 25;000' with second WL assembly #5.

05/11/2016: Logged from 26;970' to 5;000'. Pulled out of hole with WL assembly #5. TIH to 16;427' with 10-5/8" drilling BHA and Dual Cam and Special Blowout Preventer Test Tool (SBOPTT) assembly. Attempted to seat SBOPTT without success. TOH with SBOPTT and Dual Cam assembly to 13;867'. 

05/12/2016: Continued TOH with SBOPTT to surface. Inspected and serviced SBOPTT. TIH with SBOPTT assembly #2. Attempted to seat and energize SBOPTT seals without success. TOH with SBOPTT assembly #2. TIH with RTTS and set at 5;402'. Released and picked up above BOP. Pressure tested BSR against RTTS packer with 15.9 ppg to 250/1;500 psi for 5 min using Suretec IPT software; functioning BSR from Toolpusher's Panel on Blue Pod. Tested BSR/CSR from Toolpusher's Panel on Blue Pod. Good tests.

Note: On 05/12/2016 at 17:02 hrs; Gust Woldvedt (Chevron) received approval for a 24 hour extension on the BSR pressure tests for the period through midnight on 05/13/2016. This approval was granted by Kassim Y. Kassim (BSEE).

05/13/2016: TIH with RTTS overshot. Latched onto and unset RTTS packer. Flow check well and TOH with RTTS. TIH with 10-5/8" drilling BHA from 11;522' to 15;959'. Tests recorded and verified using IPT Suretec software. Pressure tested BOP on 5-7/8" drill pipe with 15.9 ppg SBM from Driller's Panel on Yellow Pod. Test pressures: surface equipment 250/11;600 psi; BOP/FSVs 250/9;700 psi; annular 250/5;200 psi - good tests. TIH and place 6-5/8" test joints spaced out across BOP in preparation for BOP pressure testing.

Note: On May 13; 2016 at 20:16 hrs CDT Kassim Kassim (BSEE) notified Justin Cremer (CVX) "Please be informed that we concur with the attached USIT log evaluation report for the 14"x13‐7/8"x13‐3/4" tieback and 14" Liner were interpreted within the 90% remaining body wall & the 11 7/8" to have the maximum 4% wear. Therefore; we have no objection for Chevron to move forward with the SS BOP test; trip to condition the hole clean; and then continue with drilling operations as per initial APD approval.Once the BOP pressure test is completed; please forward the BSR & BOP pressure tests results to our Supervisory Inspector; Phillip Couvillion for review and acceptance"

05/14/2016: Pressure tested BOP on 5-7/8" drill pipe with 15.9 ppg SBM from Driller's Panel on Yellow Pod. Tests recorded and verified using IPT Suretec software. Test pressures BOP/FSVs 250/9;700 psi; annular 250/5;200 psi. TIH with 10-5/8" drilling BHA to 26;856'. Perform diverter function test from Driller's Panel and Toolpusher's Panel. Good tests. TIH from 26;856' to 29;012'. Washed and reamed to bottom at 29;294'. Circulated bottoms up to 3;000' below BOP. 
"},{"   ":31,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608084005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-05-15","TEXT_REMARK":"05/15/2016: Tripped out of hole (TOH) above 11-7/8" shoe. Drilled 10-5/8" hole from 29;294' to 29;660'.

05/16/2016: Drilled 10-5/8" hole section from 29;660' to 29;925' (TD) with 15.9 ppg MW.

05/17/2016: Circulated hole clean from 29;925'. Flow checked the well (well static) and then began to pump out of hole from 29;925' to 29;012'. TOH from 29;012' to 6;309'. 

05/18/2016: TOH with 10-5/8" drilling BHA from 6;309' to surface. TIH with 4-1/2" cement stinger from surface to 26;882'. Started circulating bottoms up.

05/19/2016: Continued circulating bottoms up prior to cementing P&A open hole plug # 1. Made up the cement stand; and spotted P&A open hole plug # 1. Mixed and pumped 1387 cu ft of 16.8 ppg cement slurry. Cement slurry density 16.8 lb/gal; yield 1.36 cu ft/sk; mix fluid concentration 4.974 gal/sk. TOH to 27;981' and spotted P&A plug # 2. Mixed and pumped 1387 cu ft of 16.8 ppg cement slurry. Cement slurry density 16.8 lb/gal; yield 1.357 cu ft/sk; mix fluid concentration 4.966 gal/sk. TOH from 27;981' to 26;120'. No losses incurred during cement jobs. TOH to 25;378'.

05/20/2016: Continued TOH from 23;578' to surface. Tested P&A open hole plugs 1 & 2 to 1;500 psi offline (good test). TIH with 11-7/8" EZSV to 11;432'.

05/21/2016: TIH with 11-7/8" EZSV from 11;432' to 26;020'. At 26;020' observed 25k over slack off weight. Attempted to set EZSV with no success. TOH wet from 25;175' to 23;385'. TOH with 11-7/8" EZSV to 13;572'.

Note: Cesar Fuenmayor (Chevron) received verbal approval from Michael Henry (BSEE) on May 21; 2016; at 3:06:05 PM CDT to move the retainer (11-7/8" EZSV) approximately 1;000' up hole to 25;100' contingent upon a PE Certification prior to performing this operation.
"},{"   ":32,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608084005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-05-22","TEXT_REMARK":"05/22/2016: Trip out of hole (TOH) with 11-7/8" cement retainer from 13;572' MD to surface in 15.9 ppg SBM. Trip in hole (TIH) with 10-5/8" cleanout BHA from surface to 736' MD. 

05/23/2016: TIH with 10-5/8" cleanout BHA from 736' MD to 25;250' MD. Wash and ream from 25;250' MD to 25;033' MD with 10-5/8" cleanout BHA. TOH with 10-5/8" cleanout BHA from 25;033' MD to 7;954' MD. 

05/24/2016: TOH with 10-5/8" cleanout BHA from 7;954' MD to surface. TIH with 11-7/8" cement retainer from surface to 23;334' MD.

Positive pressure test 11-7/8" cement retainer to 1;500 psi for 15 minutes with 15.9 ppg SBM; good test. Perform inflow test on 11-7/8" cement retainer to 2;450 psi with 15.9 ppg SBM; good test. Mix and pump 57 bbls (320 cu ft) of 16.8 ppg cement. Displace with 651 bbls of 15.9 ppg SBM; placing cement from 25;080' MD to 24;580' MD. TOH with 11-7/8" cement retainer running tool from 24;580' MD to 23;700' MD. Mix and pump 66 bbls (370 cu ft) of 16.8 ppg cement. Displace with 620 bbls of 15.9 ppg SBM; placing cement from 23;700' MD to 23;200' MD. TOH with 10-5/8" cement retainer running tool from 23;700' MD to 20;470' MD. 

05/26/2016: TOH with 11-7/8" cement retainer running tool from 20;470' MD to 18;300' MD. Mix and pump 80 bbls (449 cu ft) of 16.6 ppg cement. Displace with 457 bbls of 15.9 ppg SBM; placing cement from 18;300' MD to 17;800' MD. TOH with 11-7/8" cement retainer running tool from 18;300' MD to surface. TIH with 14" cement retainer from surface to 11;814' MD. Set 14" cement retainer at 11;814' MD.

05/27/2016: Perform positive pressure test on 14" cement retainer to 1;000 psi for 15 minutes with 15.9 ppg SBM; good test. Mix and pump 75 bbls (421 cu ft) of 16.6 ppg cement. Displace with 284 bbls of 15.9 SBM; placing cement from 11;814' MD to 11;314' MD. TOH with 14" cementer retainer running tool from 11;814' MD to 5;360' MD. Displace choke line; kill line; boost line; well; and surface equipment from 15.9 ppg SBM to seawater. Mix and pump 46 bbls (258 cu ft) of 16.6 ppg cement. Displace with 98 bbls of seawater; placing cement from 5;360' MD to 5;060' MD. TOH with 14" cement retainer running tool from 5;360' MD to surface. TIH with riser brush assembly from surface to 5;030' MD.

05/28/2016: Jet BOP with riser brush assembly. TOH with riser brush assembly from 5;030' MD to 4;900' MD. Spot 20 bbls of wellhead preservation fluid at 4;900' MD. TOH with riser brush assembly from 4;900' MD to surface. Unlatch BOP from wellhead at 20:45 hrs. 
"},{"   ":33,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608084005400,"WAR_START_DT":"2016-05-29","TEXT_REMARK":"05/29/2016: Release tensioner ring from slip joint and lower to BOP cart. 05/30/2016: Continue to pull LMRP/BOP on marine riser from 1;724' to surface. Land out BOP on transporter and rig down riser handling equipment. Jet BOP in moonpool. Transport BOP to set back area and secure. Commence transit from Gibson #2 KC-96 to Dawn Marie #1 GB-998.
